title: Why did conservative Christian organizations label rock & roll musicians as satanic when none of their lyrics were about Satan or devil worship? - Quora

response.answer_text: Many people “think” that Satanic implies an evil action or similar. I believe the term means actions that don’t obey God. The devil can be the spirit (or thoughts) in the hearts of those that disobey God. This can include very much of society, everywhere.
